body:
@adityapatwardhan, your last commit had 4 failures in `PowerShell-CI-macos`
Open a text file with NativeCommandProcessor.Should open text file without error
```powershell
Expected 1, but got 0.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Language/Scripting/NativeExecution/NativeCommandProcessor.Tests.ps1: line 200
200:             $afterCount | Should -Be ($beforeCount + 1)
```
Invoke-Item basic tests.Invoke a text file on Unix.Should invoke text file '/tmp/d8c5c63b-1c5d-4866-afe0-46311b62f6f4/text1.txt' without error on Mac
```powershell
Expected 1, but got 0.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Invoke-Item.Tests.ps1: line 48
48:             $afterCount | Should -Be ($beforeCount + 1)
```
Invoke-Item basic tests.Invoke a text file on Unix.Should invoke text file '/tmp/d8c5c63b-1c5d-4866-afe0-46311b62f6f4/My Folder/text2.txt' without error on Mac
```powershell
Expected 1, but got 0.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Invoke-Item.Tests.ps1: line 48
48:             $afterCount | Should -Be ($beforeCount + 1)
```
Invoke-Item basic tests.Invoke a folder.Should invoke a folder without error
```powershell
Expected 1, but got 0.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Invoke-Item.Tests.ps1: line 165
165:                 $afterCount | Should -Be ($beforeCount + 1)
```
